title: Social Engagement Recommendations – Personalized Reminders for Upcoming Social Activities
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me of upcoming social activities based on my interests, so that I can stay connected and engaged with my community despite my limited mobility.

title: Simplified Video Calling for Social Connection
summary: As a retired social worker, I want an easy-to-use video calling feature so that I can maintain social connections with my family and friends without difficulty.

title: Interest-based Activity Group Connections
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest local activity groups or clubs based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and continue volunteering despite my limited mobility.

title: Memory Aid for Social Interactions – Reminders of Names and Relationships
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me of names and relationships of friends and family during conversations so that I can maintain meaningful social connections without feeling embarrassed or overwhelmed.

title: Enhanced Remote Family Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to have coordinated messaging threads for family updates so that I can easily maintain communication with my children and husband, keeping everyone informed and engaged despite my limited mobility.

title: Guided Discussions on Current Events
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to facilitate guided discussions on current events so that I can stay socially connected and engaged with my community despite my limited mobility.

title: Personalized Emotional Support – Mood Tracking with Suggestions for Uplifting Activities
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to track my mood and suggest uplifting activities so that I can maintain my emotional well-being and stay socially connected despite my limited mobility.

title: Local Resource Awareness
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to access a directory of senior-friendly venues and services so that I can stay socially connected and find suitable volunteering opportunities despite my limited mobility.
